english: revive

chinese: 她正在用这个设备让这位昏迷的男性苏醒
english: she is using the device to revive the unconscious man
emission

chinese: 燃煤发电站排放的废气会污染空气
english: the emissions from the coal power station pollute the air
prime

chinese: 我们的首要任务是减少污染
english: our prime task is to reduce the pollution
molecular

chinese: 你只能在分子水平上看见这个过程
english: you can only see this process at the molecular level
period

chinese: 他花了四年时间成了一名数学老师
english: he became a math teacher over a period of four years
cease

chinese: 雨停了，彩虹出现在天边
english: the rain ceased and the rainbow showed up
hierarchical

chinese: 我们公司等级分明，最高层的是首席执行官
english: our company has a hierarchical structure, with the CEO at the top
region
milk is produced in these regions
persuade

chinese: 他正在试图说服他的朋友和他一起坐过山车
english: he is trying to persuade his friend to go on a roller coaster with him
excessive

chinese: 贪食使得这只猫超重了
english: excessive food intake made the cat overweight
introductory

chinese: 统计学的入门课程从一个简单的例子开始，掷硬币
english: the introductory course on statistics begins with a simple example a coin toss
puzzle

chinese: 他把拼图的最后一块放进去，这幅图就完整了
english: he puts in the last piece of puzzle to complete the picture
tolerance

chinese: 在我上班的地方，我不得不养成耐受巨大噪声的能力
english: i've had to develop a tolerance for loud noise at the place where i work
